website_summaries.verdict: Possessing an intricate design, these Irish coffee mugs are sure to impress guests. They’re elegant in design, yet are durable for repeated use.
pros: This set receives top marks for its elegance
Mugs are made of thick, sturdy glass and are produced by a reputable kitchen and dining manufacturing company
We love that the brand offers coordinating pieces in the same style
cons: While they are stated to be dishwasher safe, it is recommended that these mugs are hand-washed

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Irish Coffee Glasses
customer_reviews.text: Love these Irish coffee glasses! The carving detail adds a really nice finish to the glassware. They came in fast, and in good shape ( no scratches or cracks) - you can tell the glass is very good quality. We use them to make Irish coffees every weekend and they are almost perfect - only recommendation would be to have a bigger size :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely 😊 coffee mug set
customer_reviews.text: I am really happy with these coffee mugs. My breakfast table was extremely sophisticated and gorgeous. I am buying another set to endure that I can have 8 in total. Love to invite people for brunch and these are all I needed for sophisticated brunch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty mugs
customer_reviews.text: Rated 4 because 1 of the set sits cockeyed on it's stem. The remaining 3 are beautiful & weighty. These aren't a gift or being used to entertain. I wanted to replace a couple of glass mugs used for tea that were lost in storage. I stumbled on these at a reduced price, so I'm thrilled!
customer_reviews.author: Betty A. Chilly

customer_reviews.title: Mugs are very nice and as described but be aware they are very ...
customer_reviews.text: Mugs are very nice and as described but be aware they are very hard to hold with hot liquid in them. Bottom fingers touch the glass which is very hot.
customer_reviews.author: Paul J.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality - Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the glasses - very nice quality at a great price! I liked the weight of them too - not too light!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Dillon-Angelakis

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Irish Coffee Mugs
customer_reviews.text: These are much prettier than the pictures. Sturdy, yet not clumsy looking. Can’t wait to use them on St. Patrick’s Day!
customer_reviews.author: shoegirl

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful cut glass
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are beautiful - I had so many wonderful complements on them when I used them for Irish coffee on St Pat's Day. I highly recommend them - they are very giftable.
customer_reviews.author: JES

customer_reviews.title: Very classy, well made glasses!  Perfect for serving coffee drinks to guests and family!
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are so pretty and thick. They look and feel of good quality too. I love making Irish Coffee and other coffee drinks and these are perfect to make the drinks look classy! I get lots of compliments too!
customer_reviews.author: myty44

customer_reviews.title: Irish whiskey mugs
customer_reviews.text: These Irish coffee mugs are beautiful! They are perfect for entertaining, or to just have an after dinner,(or lunch) drink. They look more expensive than they cost. Speaking of cost, I don't think you will find a better deal out there
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice but uncomfortable to hold.
customer_reviews.text: These are very uncomfortable to hold. I can't tell how many fingers I need to grip it. They look good, though.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel E. Weinberg

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for serving Gluhwein, mulled cider, glogg- any 'serve warm' beverage...
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are simply gorgeous- the etching provides a wonderful tonal contrast to whatever you put in them: especially red wines.
customer_reviews.author: Jes Walker

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy these. The finger placement hole is a little small though. Still love them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great cups
customer_reviews.text: I just love my mugs. I bought a new coffee maker and I love making it with these Irish cups . The coffee looks amazing.
customer_reviews.author: yelisa

customer_reviews.title: Really nice product for an Irish coffee
customer_reviews.text: Really nice product for an Irish coffee. Definitely a high quality look. Glass is thicker and heavier which is what I wanted. It's not wine glass-thin. Stands up well in dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: II

customer_reviews.title: Simply Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! It was more beautiful than the picture! I gave it as a gift!!
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: Great set, thick glass, sturdy. Look real nice. Used for urish coffees and homemade eggnog. Very happy with the purchase

customer_reviews.title: Durable

customer_reviews.title: appearance

customer_reviews.title: beautiful mugs
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful yet sturdy; have a thick and smooth rim, and I can get 2 fingers in the handle for stability. Used for all kinds of daily drinks.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: The Irish coffee mugs are absolutely beautiful. I cannot wait to serve hot chocolate, hot apple cider and coffee in them during the holidays.

customer_reviews.title: Godinger Irish Mugs - Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: These mugs are beautiful. They arrived in perfect shape, well packaged. They have some weight to them so they are stable when set on a table. I am planning to use them for our Christmas Eve party. I would recommend them to anyone.

customer_reviews.title: Loved them. Gave them as a gift
customer_reviews.text: Loved them. Gave them as a gift. I would purchase another set for myself!

customer_reviews.title: Nice value for the price and speedy delivery.
customer_reviews.text: I needed glass cups to complement any china pattern. These are perfect and delivery was right on target. Solidly weighted .

customer_reviews.title: Great for Company or everyday use
customer_reviews.text: These mugs are beautiful and functional as well. Great for mulled wine or irish coffee.

customer_reviews.text: Great for the price!..... Waterford would have been about $50 apiece

customer_reviews.text: They were exactly what I was looking for. Thank you

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty!

customer_reviews.text: Nice heavy glasses I will be enjoying hot toddies in.

customer_reviews.title: Saint Patrick’s Day fun
customer_reviews.text: Used for a family fun party they were very festive and fun.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty glasses, just what I wanted. Fast shipping too.
customer_reviews.author: Marnie

customer_reviews.title: A little smaller than expected but very pretty
customer_reviews.text: I love having my cappuccino in these mugs, they're so pretty! Nice weight, nice design. The description says they're 8 oz, and they are, up to the very top of the rim, but you're not likely to fill them to the very top, so I'd say they comfortably hold 6 oz. Perfect size for a regular cappuccino from my Nespresso, but not for a lungo with my usual 2 oz of milk and froth. No problem, I have larger cups for that. Overall, I'd say if you're looking for a 6-7 oz mug, these will fit the bill and make a nice presentation for your specialty coffee drinks.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Irish friends approved!
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are exactly as pictured and look even better in person! They have a nice weight to them. You can tell they are quality glasses. My friends from Ireland who've migrated here mentioned they were looking for some irish coffee glasses, so I new I'd find them on Amazon and have them as a birthday gift to my friend. They said they were exactly what they were looking for! Now they've invited me for some irish coffee. Can't wait!
customer_reviews.author: QueenB

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: When ordering these "Crystal" mugs I believed I would be receiving 4 lovely Irish Cream coffee mugs, but instead there are flaws in the glass itself! One of the mugs is worse then the others because the handle has a crack where the Styrofoam entered the mug & left pieces inside & can NOT be removed :( Shame on you!!
customer_reviews.author: Nana Rosie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful mugs!
customer_reviews.text: I can not believe how inexpensive these are! They are beautiful mugs! We use them for Irish coffees and the presentation with these really is great. I will be buying for as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Ksull03

customer_reviews.title: Will use these for Tom and Jerrys on New Year's Eve.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't tried them yet but they seem to be very sturdy. They are also very pretty. They were also a good price. I'm glad they were eligible for Prime so I could get them for New Year's Eve.
customer_reviews.author: Julie M. Fredericksen

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Tea glasses.
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Sturdy. We use it for tea. I know it can be used for small size Irish coffee. I'd like them bigger!!
customer_reviews.author: alizamanian

customer_reviews.title: Dublin/China
customer_reviews.text: I like the Irish Coffee mugs but I am confused about the Dublin/China labels. Are they made in China? Or Dublin? I don't understand. Please clarify.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very elegant set of Irish coffee mugs. Handle is very easy to hold mug. Size is perfect-not to large and not to small for Irish coffee mug. Highly recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot emphasize enough how extremely beautiful these are. Very sturdy, elegant design and cost effective. Delivered on time.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful Irish Coffee Mugs great gift with a bottle of Irish Cream.

customer_reviews.title: Not crystal, but serviceable.
customer_reviews.text: Thick chuncky glass mugs in no way resemble crystal. But sturdy mugs arrived unbroken and usable.

customer_reviews.text: These are much nicer than I thought they'd be for the price. Nice heavy quality

customer_reviews.title: they look like I spent a lot of money on them
customer_reviews.text: Let me say,they look like I spent a lot of money on them!
customer_reviews.author: ip

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Would probably give five stars for quality and price except these mugs are much smaller than described. We expected 10 oz. mugs and received 6 oz.. 8 oz. appears to be the average for other Irish coffee mugs so we were excited to get slightly larger mugs. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted these for Irish Coffee and they are great. They are thick so I don't have to worry about glass breaking from hot water. They also look great with Irish Coffee in them and make a nice serving glass for company. I have used them several times. I do not put them in the dishwasher - crystal will eventually become cloudy if washed in the dish washer. Once they get cloudy, there is nothing you can do to get them back to normal.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Girl

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous f
customer_reviews.text: I had 4 of these lovely mugs and had to have 4 more for a dinner party. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: tms
